knimeNode.name: Rule2DPlotter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Displays rules (both crisp and fuzzy) in two selectable dimensions.

fullDescription.intro: Displays crisp or fuzzy rules in two selectable dimensions; the data points explained by the rules are also displayed. The rules are displayed in the color defined by their referring row identifier (ID) color attribute. They may be selected and hilited. Fuzzy rules are displayed with their core and their support area, with increasing transparency to the edges. Note, the node always expects a org.knime.core.data.FuzzyIntervalValue per dimension even when it is a crisp rule. In order to obtain crips rules, simply make the core the same as the support.

ports.dataIn: Input table with the data points explained by the rules
Input table with the rules explaining the data points. They must be provided as a FuzzyIntervalValue per dimension.

views.view: Displays rules and data points in 2D.
